question: I puchased a few plots of land in Pakistan over 10 years ago for the specific purpose of selling them at a later stage
answer:
QUESTION

I puchased a few plots of land in Pakistan over 10 years ago for the specific purpose of selling them at a later stage to make or purchase a house and invest the remaining proceeds to generate income for my retirement.  Kindly let me know if I am liable to pay Zakat on this land.

Thank you

Masood Said

 

ANSWER


Share:

Muhtaram

 

Assalamualaikum Warahmatullahi Wabarakatuhu

 

If you purchase the ten pieces of land to resell, you will have to pay Zakaat at 2,5 % of the market related value of those lands.

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
